TopicTitle: [Cool] My old Apollo Tech got stolen by a youtuber!

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iuRMNz-sbEs

I was going through KSP stuff on youtube and I found this, my KW rocketry Saturn V/Apollo remake from last year!

I put it on the spaceport back in 18.2 and just now I ran into it on a youtube vid!

The Author did not have what I would call a nominal flight though..., nevertheless he made it to the Mun

Also I'm not sure if he didn't tinker with the stats on the parts cause I swear that the Thor SRB's burned extra long:huh:

You can follow the links from here to youtube to the spaceport, find the link to the craft in the description.
Umm... how can something made available for public download be "stolen"? Especially since he linked to your craft.

And Apollo 11 sure didn't have 3 SRBs lol.... I've built better looking Apollo rockets using KW and Novapunch. I know there is a Kerpollo pack that does it even better.

This YT guy... yeah... Not Apollo at all.

Umm... how can something made available for public download be "stolen"? Especially since he linked to your craft.

[Cool] <-- this means he's not using the word Stolen literally. Poor wording, yes, but it's nothing to stir controversy.

@NeoMorph

It was last year's stuff after all

And to DerekL1963 I ask this question: Do a need a lawyer to make a post here? Cause I've never seen a legal document with emotocons scattered throughout, like this :huh::sealed:

I had impression that OP is happy, that his (or similar) design has been used in somebody video and just used confusing words to describe it.

Edited May 15, 2013 by karolus10

I had impression that OP is happy, that his (or similar) design has been used in somebody video and just used confusing words to describe it.

That's my thought as well, I've seen people use the word stolen in the wrong way all the time.

@NeoMorphAnd to DerekL1963 I ask this question: Do a need a lawyer to make a post here?

I missed the [cool], no biggie.
He linked to it in his description
